channel.title: Webpack on Hang Jiang
channel.description: Recent content in Webpack on Hang Jiang

item.title: Webpack 和 React 实战
item.description: TL;DR 🔗$ git clone https://github.com/nodejh/start-react-with-webpack react-sample $ cd react-sample && npm install $ npm run dev 然后打开浏览器输入 http://localhost:8080，并尝试随意修改一下 app 目录里面的代码，就能看到
